argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ldualsmul.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | ldualsmul.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 |  | ldualsmul.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` F ) |
| 4 |  | ldualsmul.d | |- D = ( LDual ` W ) |
| 5 |  | ldualsmul.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` D ) |
| 6 |  | ldualsmul.m | |- .xb = ( .r ` R ) |
| 7 |  | ldualsmul.w | |- ( ph -> W e. V ) |
| 8 |  | ldualsmul.x | |- ( ph -> X e. K ) |
| 9 |  | ldualsmul.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. K ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppR ` F ) = ( oppR ` F ) |
| 11 | 1, 10, 4, 5, 7 | #P_ldualsca | |- ( ph -> R = ( oppR ` F ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( .r ` R ) = ( .r ` ( oppR ` F ) ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> .xb = ( .r ` ( oppR ` F ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ph -> ( X .xb Y ) = ( X ( .r ` ( oppR ` F ) ) Y ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` ( oppR ` F ) ) = ( .r ` ( oppR ` F ) ) |
| 16 | 2, 3, 10, 15 | #P_opprmul | |- ( X ( .r ` ( oppR ` F ) ) Y ) = ( Y .x. X ) |
| 17 | 14, 16 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( ph -> ( X .xb Y ) = ( Y .x. X ) ) |
